name: 10 For 10000°
description:
A BABY MAY PLAY BETTER THAN YOU!
The Secret of the Butterfly Effect.
Click 10 times, and then trigger a series of changes to reach 10000 degrees.
This is a full of infinite challenges of the intellectual game, but it is so simple to play.

HOW TO PLAY

When you click on a pointer, it will rotate 90 degrees clockwise, the next pointer that points to will rotate. 10 clicks to get 10000 degrees.

I am a Chinese independent game developer, I studied game design by myself three and a half years. seven months ago I designed a puzzle game "bdpq", fortunately it was featured by Apple in "Challenge Your Brain". This 7 months I have been thinking about how to design a new game that can go beyond it, more able to challenge the limits of human intelligence. After dozens of program attempts, I seem to find the way. Last mouth, I designed a new game "Chinese-Puzzle" , fortunately it was featured by Apple in China. Hundreds of thousands of Chinese people like it. So I designed a new one.

I hope that more people around the world will love it. Forgive me for my poor English :)

Sleeeeepfly Studios
Yufeng Long
